extendedInfo.description: Easily track your baby's movements and get detailed statistics on your baby's activeness.One of the most exciting moments in your pregnancy is when you feel those first little flutters of your baby kicking. These tiny movements reassure you that your baby is developing and help you feel closer to the little life inside of you.With this application you can,* Start a counting session and keep it running until you choose to stop it* Record your baby's movements inside a counting session* Review past counting sessions* See daily and monthly history of kicks* Get statistics about your baby's activeness such as her hourly activeness, daily activeness, estimated kicks per day, etc...* Add notes to a counting session* Email session history data* Delete a kick or a entire session anytimeTo start a counting session press the 'Start Session' button.To record a movement press the 'Kicked Now' button.To record a movement happened a while ago, press the 'Kicked Earlier' buttonTo add a note, press the 'Special Notes' button.To stop a counting session press the 'Stop Session' button.To view past sessions press the 'History' button.To email history, press the 'Email History' button.To get more details on a past counting session select that session on Session History page.To get statistics of your baby's movements press the 'Stats' button.To delete a kick press and hold the record in Home page.To delete a session press and hold the record in Session History page.

reviews.title: Just started
reviews.comment: I just downloaded this app. It\'s my first time using a kick counter. It is super easy to use, and I already love it. Thank you for creating an easy program.
reviews.author: Melinda Brake

reviews.title: Very accessible!
reviews.comment: I love this app! It\'s so easy to use and very convenient to just grab your phone when your baby starts kicking. I wish there was a way to print a log per session, per day, per month and the entire history - would be nice to have.
reviews.author: Carmela Raport

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I like it, easy to use. Would be great if I could email stats to my DR or myself so I could print and bring to DR.
reviews.author: Jessica Perkowitz

reviews.title: Amazing App, Could Use Something Else
reviews.comment: I love this app, but I only have a couple things I dislike. I can\'t go back to a session and leave a note, like if I had soda or just ate, or forgot to end the session at whatever time. Second is I can only enter whole minutes from the last kick which looks inacccurate when he kicked 5 times within a couple mins before I got the app out. Last I would like there to be a settings menu. It could open up much more customization if you are picky as me, lots of ideas. I would pay 1.99 for an improved version
reviews.author: Kinna Elrod

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: This is a great app. Functions very nicely.
reviews.author: Elizabeth Gavin

reviews.title: Very helpful!
reviews.comment: It allows you to save the history, gives stats, and easily view daily kick history.
reviews.author: Brandi Baker

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: I really liked this app. The statistics part is very good.
reviews.author: Chamini Hasanga

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Love how you can see history of kicks. Love being able to screen shot each day and send to partner who works away from home. Makes him feel more included in pregnancy while he is awaym best kick counter app I\'ve tried x
reviews.author: danielle vickers
